          <title>
            <string language="en">Mixing metals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mischende Metalle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Métaux de mélange</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Metais misturando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Metalli di miscelazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μίξη των μετάλλων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Metales que se mezclan</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that metals can be mixed to obtain desired properties for different applications, as in coinage and jewellery.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gold</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">jewellery</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">coinage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">material properties</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mixed metals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mixtures</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">silver</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Metalle gemischt 
werden können, um gewünschte Eigenschaften für unterschiedliche 
Anwendungen zu erreichen, wie in der Prägung und in den 
Schmucksachen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que des métaux peuvent
être mélangés pour obtenir les propriétés désirées pour 
différentes applications, comme en invention et bijoux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que os metais podem ser 
misturados para obter propriedades desejadas para aplicações 
diferentes, como no coinage e na jóia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che i metalli possono
essere mescolati per ottenere le proprietà volute per le applicazioni
differenti, come in invenzione e monili.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι τα μέταλλα μπορούν να 
αναμιχθούν για να λάβουν τις επιθυμητές ιδιότητες για τις 
διαφορετικές εφαρμογές, όπως στη δημιουργία και τα κοσμήματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que los metales se 
pueden mezclar para obtener las características deseadas para 
diversas aplicaciones, como en la invención y la joyería.</string>
          </description>
